name: Cannon Game (jdong6)
description:
It's an arcade game where you shoot cannonballs at enemies!

I'm not sure how well touch controls work on a variety of devices but it works well enough on my Galaxy S9+.

Would ideally like to add/polish game-modes, like sieges, boss battles, or target practice. Also enemies, and cooler cannons (gatling guns, orbital missiles, hwachas, mortars, etc)

There's an AOE effect after the cannonball explodes which may be a bit unpredictable at the moment.

Android only.
